catch_conc.csv
--------------
runoff concentration for different landuse types as measured in OgRe
Median and 95% Quantile 


spec_conc.csv
-------------
runoff concentration for specific areas, based on OgRe data evaluation for r2q function
table. The column names are function IDs as specified in "extdata/IDs/function_ids.csv)
The IDs can be loadad into R with r2q:::get_functionsID().
